message.content:
{
  "weekly_summary": "The week exhibited strong bullish momentum in midcap and smallcap sectors, particularly in financials, infrastructure, metals, and renewables, driven by high trading volumes and volatility. Key performers included LTF, BSE, and SAIL with significant gains and massive volumes, signaling resilience in banking and cyclicals. Portfolio value increased to ₹25,546.80 (+3.65%) amid mixed holdings performance, with gains in KPIGREEN (+12.47%), HINDCOPPER (+6.68%), and BEL (+4.64%) offsetting losses in CREDITACC (-5.31%) and IDBI (-3.26%). Opportunities persist in renewables and infrastructure for diversification, while underperformers in banking warrant adjustments to optimize returns.",
  "trades": [
    {
      "action": "sell",
      "symbol": "IDBI",
      "shares": 10,
      "amount": 1004.2,
      "reason": "Continued downtrend with -3.26% loss and prior signals indicating weakness in smallcap banking; reallocate to stronger sectors like renewables or infrastructure to mitigate losses"
    },
    {
      "action": "sell",
      "symbol": "CREDITACC",
      "shares": 3,
      "amount": 4040.7,
      "reason": "Decline of -5.31% amid volatility in smallcap financials; prior signals suggest trimming underperformers to free up cash for high-momentum stocks"
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "LTF",
      "shares": 10,
      "amount": 3036,
      "reason": "Explosive surge to ₹303.60 with enormous volume (70M+), aligning with prior signals for bullish midcap financials; enhances portfolio exposure to high-growth banking"
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "SAIL",
      "shares": 20,
      "amount": 2820,
      "reason": "Strong upward movement to ₹141.00 with massive volume (32M+), per prior signals indicating momentum in smallcap metals for cyclical diversification"
    }
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 2419.6,
    "total_value": 25546.8,
    "holdings_count": 6,
    "holdings": [
      "HINDCOPPER: 15 units",
      "WAAREEENER: 1 units",
      "BEL: 12 units",
      "KPIGREEN: 10 units",
      "LTF: 10 units",
      "SAIL: 20 units"
    ],
    "weekly_pnl": "+3.65%"
  },
  "screening_changes": [
    "Remove NYKAA: Consistent underperformance and low suitability for current momentum-focused strategy",
    "Remove JUBLFOOD: Declining trend and reduced volume, no longer aligns with growth criteria",
    "Remove IDBI: Persistent weakness and sold from portfolio, unsuitable for screening list"
  ]
}
